2023 年 10 月 26 日星期四 08:06:24 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
如何让学习像社交媒体一样让人上瘾|路易斯·冯·安路易斯·冯·安When technologist Luis von Ahn was building the popular language-learning platform Duolingo, he faced a big problem: Could an app designed to teach you something ever compete with addictive platforms like Instagram and TikTok? He explains how Duolingo harnesses the psychological techniques of social media and mobile games to get you excited to learn — all while spreading access to education across the world.如何让学习像社交媒体一样让人上瘾|路易斯·冯·安When technologist Luis von Ahn was building the popular language-learning platform Duolingo, he faced a big problem: Could an app designed to teach you something ever compete with addictive platforms like Instagram and TikTok? He explains how Duolingo harnesses the psychological techniques of social media and mobile games to get you excited to learn — all while spreading access to education across the world. https://www.ted.com/talks/luis_von_ahn_how_to_make_learning_as_addictive_as_social_media?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118164 118164 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 14:53:35 +0000高等教育不00:12:50泰德
护理是真正的工作——让我们这样对待它吧 |沙米·苏里纳拉因沙米·苏里纳拉因Every day, people around the world spend 16 billion hours on unpaid care work — cooking for families, caring for children and older relatives and other routine household tasks — often in addition to other jobs. Employment advocate Sharmi Surianarain says we need to not only acknowledge this labor but also build supportive workplaces that put policies with care work top of mind.护理是真正的工作——让我们这样对待它吧 |沙米·苏里纳拉因Every day, people around the world spend 16 billion hours on unpaid care work — cooking for families, caring for children and older relatives and other routine household tasks — often in addition to other jobs. Employment advocate Sharmi Surianarain says we need to not only acknowledge this labor but also build supportive workplaces that put policies with care work top of mind. https://www.ted.com/talks/shami_surianarain_caregiving_is_real_work_let_s_treat_it_that_way?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:117219 117219 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 15:04:15 +0000高等教育不00:05:10泰德
更清洁的世界可以从稻田开始吉姆·惠特克和杰西卡·惠特克·艾伦吉姆·惠特克和杰西卡·惠特克·艾伦Rice is the world's largest food source — and it's also a massive emitter of methane gas, a key contributor to climate change. Fifth-generation rice farmer Jim Whitaker and his daughter, farmer and conservationist Jessica Whitaker Allen, are working to slash rice's environmental impacts with innovative, sustainable farming practices. They share how they're keeping their family farm in Arkansas profitable while also spreading green farming practices to their neighbors — and, eventually, the rest of the world. "If you take care of the planet, it will take care of you," says Whitaker Allen.更清洁的世界可以从稻田开始吉姆·惠特克和杰西卡·惠特克·艾伦Rice is the world's largest food source — and it's also a massive emitter of methane gas, a key contributor to climate change. Fifth-generation rice farmer Jim Whitaker and his daughter, farmer and conservationist Jessica Whitaker Allen, are working to slash rice's environmental impacts with innovative, sustainable farming practices. They share how they're keeping their family farm in Arkansas profitable while also spreading green farming practices to their neighbors — and, eventually, the rest of the world. "If you take care of the planet, it will take care of you," says Whitaker Allen. https://www.ted.com/talks/jim_whitaker_and_jessica_whitaker_allen_a_cleaner_world_could_start_in_a_rice_field?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119204 119204 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 14:53:33 +0000高等教育不00:12:17泰德
乌克兰的普通人做着不平凡的事|奥莱克桑德拉·马特维丘克奥莱克桑德拉·马特维丘克How do we defend people's freedom and dignity against authoritarianism, when the "law of war" doesn't seem to apply anymore? In the face of the Russian occupation of Ukraine, human rights lawyer and Nobel laureate Oleksandra Matviichuk considers this question every day. Exposing the failures of the international system of peace and security, she highlights the capabilities of ordinary people during extraordinary times — and urges us all to take an active position in the struggle for freedom. (This talk contains graphic imagery.) 乌克兰的普通人做着不平凡的事|奥莱克桑德拉·马特维丘克How do we defend people's freedom and dignity against authoritarianism, when the "law of war" doesn't seem to apply anymore? In the face of the Russian occupation of Ukraine, human rights lawyer and Nobel laureate Oleksandra Matviichuk considers this question every day. Exposing the failures of the international system of peace and security, she highlights the capabilities of ordinary people during extraordinary times — and urges us all to take an active position in the struggle for freedom. (This talk contains graphic imagery.) https://www.ted.com/talks/oleksandra_matviichuk_the_ordinary_people_doing_extraordinary_things_in_ukraine?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119219 119219 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 14:58:29 +0000高等教育不00:14:21泰德
让我们重新构建取消文化 |萨拉·琼斯萨拉·琼斯Cancel culture launched a reckoning that was long overdue — but that doesn't mean it's getting everything right. Filmmaker and actor Sarah Jones slips in and out of various characters as she shares her personal experience with cancel culture and suggests a better way to hold others — and ourselves — to account. 让我们重新构建取消文化 |萨拉·琼斯Cancel culture launched a reckoning that was long overdue — but that doesn't mean it's getting everything right. Filmmaker and actor Sarah Jones slips in and out of various characters as she shares her personal experience with cancel culture and suggests a better way to hold others — and ourselves — to account. https://www.ted.com/talks/sarah_jones_let_s_reframe_cancel_culture?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:115676 115676 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 14:47:22 +0000高等教育不00:14:24泰德
在维基百科上学习随机事物的乐趣 |安妮·劳维达安妮·劳维达Writer Annie Rauwerda makes a habit of getting lost among the seemingly endless digital archives of Wikipedia, discovering fake towns, promiscuous tortoises, 19th-century fangirls and so much more. An avid editor of the crowd-sourced platform, she speaks to the joys of exploring niche and humorous subjects, accidentally learning just for fun — and broadening your horizons along the way.在维基百科上学习随机事物的乐趣 |安妮·劳维达Writer Annie Rauwerda makes a habit of getting lost among the seemingly endless digital archives of Wikipedia, discovering fake towns, promiscuous tortoises, 19th-century fangirls and so much more. An avid editor of the crowd-sourced platform, she speaks to the joys of exploring niche and humorous subjects, accidentally learning just for fun — and broadening your horizons along the way. https://www.ted.com/talks/annie_rauwerda_the_joy_of_learning_random_things_on_wikipedia?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118166 118166 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 14:54:37 +0000高等教育不00:12:21泰德
气候行动联盟！ |佩顿·威尔金斯佩顿·威尔金斯In the long term, shutting down a coal mine means cleaner air and a healthier environment — but in the short term, it can devastate a community or family that relied on the mine's paychecks to make ends meet. Environmental justice advocate Payton M. Wilkins thinks we can protect both workers and the planet with an age-old solution: unions. He digs into the economic fallout of ditching fossil fuels and shows why unions are well-positioned to push the transition to clean energy and green jobs.气候行动联盟！ |佩顿·威尔金斯In the long term, shutting down a coal mine means cleaner air and a healthier environment — but in the short term, it can devastate a community or family that relied on the mine's paychecks to make ends meet. Environmental justice advocate Payton M. Wilkins thinks we can protect both workers and the planet with an age-old solution: unions. He digs into the economic fallout of ditching fossil fuels and shows why unions are well-positioned to push the transition to clean energy and green jobs. https://www.ted.com/talks/payton_m_wilkins_unions_for_climate_action?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118893 118893 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 14:55:36 +0000高等教育不00:09:04泰德
休息如何让您更好地完成工作 | Alex Soojung-Kim Pang Alex Soojung-Kim Pang Yes, you need to take breaks at work. Not only is resting good for your brain — it might even make you more creative. Here are consultant Alex Soojung-Kim Pang's four tips to help you step away and return to your job with more energy to get things done.休息如何让您更好地完成工作 | Alex Soojung-Kim Pang Yes, you need to take breaks at work. “财富”对你来说意味着什么？ |艾莎·尼安多罗艾莎·尼安多罗For people living in poverty, a guaranteed income can mean finally having the space to dream of a comfortable life. Sharing the stories of single moms who participated in a first-of-its-kind program that offered them $1,000 per month with no strings attached, poverty disrupter Aisha Nyandoro calls for us to redefine what it means to be wealthy — putting aside lavish vacations and fancy cars in favor of paid bills and a well-fed family — and to listen when people tell us what they need most. “财富”对你来说意味着什么？ |艾莎·尼安多罗For people living in poverty, a guaranteed income can mean finally having the space to dream of a comfortable life. Sharing the stories of single moms who participated in a first-of-its-kind program that offered them $1,000 per month with no strings attached, poverty disrupter Aisha Nyandoro calls for us to redefine what it means to be wealthy — putting aside lavish vacations and fancy cars in favor of paid bills and a well-fed family — and to listen when people tell us what they need most. https://www.ted.com/talks/aisha_nyandoro_what_does_wealth_mean_to_you?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119035 119035 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:58:36 +0000高等教育不00:12:34泰德
我父亲阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼的教训 |达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚Dasha Navalnaya is the daughter of Alexey Navalny, the politician and leader of the Russian opposition to Vladimir Putin. Sharing the story of her father's poisoning, persecution and current imprisonment, she details what it was like growing up under the watchful eye of government surveillance as her father led a decade-long investigation into the corruption of Putin's regime — and shows why paying attention to what happens in Russia matters to everyone, everywhere.我父亲阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼的教训 |达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚Dasha Navalnaya is the daughter of Alexey Navalny, the politician and leader of the Russian opposition to Vladimir Putin. Sharing the story of her father's poisoning, persecution and current imprisonment, she details what it was like growing up under the watchful eye of government surveillance as her father led a decade-long investigation into the corruption of Putin's regime — and shows why paying attention to what happens in Russia matters to everyone, everywhere. https://www.ted.com/talks/dasha_navalnaya_lessons_from_my_father_alexey_navalny?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119023 119023 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 14:51:00 +0000高等教育不00:11:03泰德
“距任何海岸线数英里”|莎拉·凯莎拉·凯Sarah Kay shares "Miles from Any Shoreline," a poem about "wandering the streets of Bewilderville" and "picking up when the universe calls." “距任何海岸线数英里”|莎拉·凯Sarah Kay shares "Miles from Any Shoreline," a poem about "wandering the streets of Bewilderville" and "picking up when the universe calls." https://www.ted.com/talks/sarah_kay_miles_from_any_shoreline?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118554 118554 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 14:30:21 +0000高等教育不00:03:44泰德
